section.sectionTitle: Sponsor through the Youth Employment Program
section.sectionText:
Looking to make a more direct impact on the local working youth?
Consider making a sponsor donation. Funds allocated here go toward the
items our hard working crews and individuals need on a daily basis!

testimonial.testimonialQuote: Being able to work with high school students is a different skill in itself. It was frustrating and difficult because it would take so long to get our projects done due to no one wanting to work. But we did find that they are motivated by food, much like myself. So if anyone has any other knowledge on how to get a 16-year-old boy or girl to do manual labor, please let me know!

stripeCard.stripeText: Sponsor $25 worth of supplies to a crewmember.
Sponsor $50 worth of supplies to a crewmember.
Sponsor $100 worth of supplies to a crewmember.
